channel.title: FTB downtime
channel.description: I know it's down and all, but I'm unable to do anything effective. I can't download/upload anything and it's been extremely laggy for me, unless Zuppers can sort something out I'm going to have to retry again tomorrow. It started happening when I was in the middle of changing it around, so it's massively inconvenient and a pain to deal with for somebody else. Just had my third attempt to download something and it has ended in failure.

item.title: FTB downtime
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Ok thank you for letting us know, I’m sure people won’t mind waiting

Read full topic
